results.content: I am only 25% into the course and I truly enjoyed it. The instructor is very good in conveying his thoughts and I felt his teaching expertise in the way he presented the topics. The topics are organized in such a way that will allow the student to learn from easy to hard. He also covered a lot of subjects. It was totally worth it buying this course!

results.content: The short mini exercises after every topic ensures that listener remains active and focused

results.content: Ich finde es sehr hilfreich, dass dieser Kurs sehr ausführlich und mit vielen praktischen Beispielen das Thema systematisch und auf einander aufbauend abarbeitet.
results.content_html: Ich finde es sehr hilfreich, dass dieser Kurs sehr ausführlich und mit vielen praktischen Beispielen das Thema systematisch und auf einander aufbauend abarbeitet.

results.content: Very good explanation and nice examples!

Make no mistake. This is the most comprehensive React course on the market. The course covers everything that one needs to know. I especially like that each feature of React is covered with small examples. The approach works great. The instructor is very knowledgeable and motivated. Regardless if you're new to Javascript or already a seasoned developer, you will derive value from this course. I am thrilled with my purchase!
